name: Cosmos Banana
description:
Context

This game was made under 48h for a Game JAM of theme: "Time".

Game mechanics

Cosmos Banana is a platformer game where you play a monkey capable of time leaping between 3 different timelines; Past, Present, Future.

Each timeline affects the environment as well as the player, providing them with different abilities.

Past: A tiny monkey capable of grappling surfaces with its tail.

Present: A gorilla capable of punching destructibles.

Future: A cybord capable of telekinesis.

Team
  • Mathieu Schmerber: Design, Programming, Art, Musics, Sound design.
